entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
